Create and Add Key

{% raw %} 
from OpenAISurveyWrapper.survey import survey
import json, pandas as pd
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
tmp = survey()
tmp.add_key(json.load(open("../gpt3/key.json", "r"))["key"])
